course_name: Evidence Based Innovation: From Business Model To Business Plan
description: This course introduces an evidence-based approach to innovation management to provide students with the capability to understand the strategic value of information and the tools and techniques that can be used to analyse and apply that information to improve decision-making. Students will learn how to apply the most effective tools in developing sustainable business models by exploiting viable, validated opportunities in rapidly changing environments where traditional strategic management approaches are less effective. Course content is based on the Innovation Diamond Model, which has extensive empirical support, and teaches students how to connect the four key processes of innovation strategy, portfolio management, stage gate product/service development process and innovation culture.
